about.title: About Me
about.body: Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in React, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Next.js, MongoDB, and Supabase. Skilled in creating scalable web applications and contributing to both frontend and backend in remote or on-site work.

items.name: Technical Lead (ERP Development)
items.description: Design and implementation of ERP architecture using Next.js, Node.js and PostgreSQL, with CI/CD pipeline setup. Leading a development team (code reviews, task prioritization) and mentoring juniors. Managing client demonstrations and technical presentations, maintaining GitHub workflows.

items.name: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Technical leadership on backend (Node.js) and implementation of business features. Frontend development with Next.js and state management with Redux. Deployment via Docker and CI/CD process automation.

items.name: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Application development with Next.js, Node.js (TypeScript), GraphQL and Supabase. Design of scalable and high-performance features. Contribution to 12+ projects using GraphQL, Shadcn and Supabase.

items.name: LinkTrack
items.description: Open source platform for creating custom short links and analyzing engagement, demonstrating professional quality work. Technologies: Next.js 15, Supabase, shadcn/ui; responsive interface, secure authentication and optimized performance. Includes usage statistics, role-based access and subscription plans; deployed on linktrack.app.

items.name: Payment Gateway
items.description: Complete development of a robust solution for one-time and recurring payments. Designed frontend with Next.js and backend with Node.js for a smooth user experience. Integrated PayPal and Stripe to expand payment options.

items.name: Multimedia and Web Development Diploma
items.institution: Higher Institute of Technological Studies of Djerba

resume.title: Download Resume
resume.description: Get my complete professional experience and skills
